descriptions.text: Vin is a young street urchin who discovers she has Allomantic powers. Early on, she is cautious and mistrustful, surviving the streets of Luthadel.
Vin is a young street urchin who discovers she has Allomantic powers. She slowly grows more confident as she learns to use her abilities.
Vin is a young street urchin who discovers she has Allomantic powers. Vin becomes a key figure in the rebellion and trusted Mistborn.
Vin is a young street urchin who discovers she has Allomantic powers. Her determination and sense of loyalty define her as events reach their climax.
Kelsier is a charismatic and daring Mistborn who leads the skaa rebellion. He is already a legend among the skaa, known for surviving the Pits of Hathsin.
Kelsier is a charismatic and daring Mistborn who leads the skaa rebellion. His confidence inspires the crew and Vin alike.
Kelsier is a charismatic and daring Mistborn who leads the skaa rebellion. Kelsier’s larger-than-life persona pushes the rebellion forward.
Kelsier is a charismatic and daring Mistborn who leads the skaa rebellion. Even after pivotal events, his legacy shapes everything around him.
Elend Venture is an idealistic nobleman who questions the corrupt society he was born into. He first appears as an unlikely ally with progressive ideas.
Elend Venture is an idealistic nobleman who questions the corrupt society he was born into. Elend’s respect for justice and books sets him apart from other nobles.
Elend Venture is an idealistic nobleman who questions the corrupt society he was born into. His relationship with Vin deepens as he supports the rebellion’s ideals.
Elend Venture is an idealistic nobleman who questions the corrupt society he was born into. He continues to evolve, stepping into leadership by the story’s end.
Sazed is a Terris Keeper, a scholar and servant dedicated to preserving knowledge. He serves as a guide to Vin and the crew, offering wisdom.
Sazed is a Terris Keeper, a scholar and servant dedicated to preserving knowledge. His deep understanding of religions and cultures adds depth to the rebellion’s efforts.
Sazed is a Terris Keeper, a scholar and servant dedicated to preserving knowledge. Sazed’s calm demeanor steadies those around him.
Sazed is a Terris Keeper, a scholar and servant dedicated to preserving knowledge. His quiet resolve remains even as the world changes.
Breeze is a smooth-talking Soother who manipulates emotions with ease. He adds levity and charm to the crew’s efforts.
Breeze is a smooth-talking Soother who manipulates emotions with ease. Breeze’s easy manner hides a calculating mind.
Breeze is a smooth-talking Soother who manipulates emotions with ease. He provides valuable guidance during tense negotiations.
Breeze is a smooth-talking Soother who manipulates emotions with ease. His wit and practicality persist through the rebellion’s hardships.
Clubs is a gruff Smoker who shields allies from magical detection. His blunt nature keeps the crew grounded.
Clubs is a gruff Smoker who shields allies from magical detection. Clubs is fiercely loyal and protective.
Clubs is a gruff Smoker who shields allies from magical detection. He becomes a steadfast figure as danger increases.
Clubs is a gruff Smoker who shields allies from magical detection. His practicality and courage never waver.
Spook is a young Tineye eager to prove himself. Initially shy, he seeks a role in the crew.
Spook is a young Tineye eager to prove himself. His skills as a scout and listener make him useful.
Spook is a young Tineye eager to prove himself. Spook slowly grows into his responsibilities.
Spook is a young Tineye eager to prove himself. He matures, showing quiet bravery.
Dockson is the crew’s organizer, managing plans and logistics. Calm and practical, he keeps operations running.
Dockson is the crew’s organizer, managing plans and logistics. His reliability helps the crew stay on course.
Dockson is the crew’s organizer, managing plans and logistics. Dockson remains the backbone of the rebellion’s efforts.
Dockson is the crew’s organizer, managing plans and logistics. His level-headed approach steadies everyone else.
Ham is a philosophical Thug who blends strength with surprising thoughtfulness. He brings muscle and musings to the crew.
Ham is a philosophical Thug who blends strength with surprising thoughtfulness. His sense of humor and debate add warmth.
Ham is a philosophical Thug who blends strength with surprising thoughtfulness. Ham’s strength proves vital as threats grow.
Ham is a philosophical Thug who blends strength with surprising thoughtfulness. He remains a loyal, thoughtful ally.
Marsh is Kelsier’s serious older brother and a skilled Seeker. He helps the crew with his knowledge of Allomancers.
Marsh is Kelsier’s serious older brother and a skilled Seeker. Marsh’s dedication to the cause is unwavering.
Marsh is Kelsier’s serious older brother and a skilled Seeker. His path takes a darker turn as he infiltrates the obligators.
Marsh is Kelsier’s serious older brother and a skilled Seeker. Marsh’s transformation leaves lasting questions.
The Lord Ruler is the immortal, godlike tyrant who has ruled the Final Empire for centuries. His presence looms over every corner of the empire.
The Lord Ruler is the immortal, godlike tyrant who has ruled the Final Empire for centuries. Rumors and fear surround his true nature.
The Lord Ruler is the immortal, godlike tyrant who has ruled the Final Empire for centuries. The rebellion draws closer to challenging his reign.
The Lord Ruler is the immortal, godlike tyrant who has ruled the Final Empire for centuries. His identity and power cast a long shadow over the story’s end.
Straff Venture is a cunning nobleman and the father of Elend Venture. Mentioned in passing, his influence is felt from afar.
Straff Venture is a cunning nobleman and the father of Elend Venture. His cold ambition defines him among nobles.
Straff Venture is a cunning nobleman and the father of Elend Venture. Straff’s distant scheming shapes events quietly.
Straff Venture is a cunning nobleman and the father of Elend Venture. He remains a looming figure even when not present.
Reen was Vin’s abusive older brother, whose lessons of mistrust haunt her. His voice echoes in Vin’s mind, warning her against trust.
Reen was Vin’s abusive older brother, whose lessons of mistrust haunt her. Memories of his harsh teachings linger.
Reen was Vin’s abusive older brother, whose lessons of mistrust haunt her. Reen’s influence shapes Vin’s caution.
Reen was Vin’s abusive older brother, whose lessons of mistrust haunt her. Even as she grows, his shadow lingers in her thoughts.
Kar is a brutish Inquisitor, one of the Lord Ruler’s feared enforcers. His appearances are menacing and violent.
Kar is a brutish Inquisitor, one of the Lord Ruler’s feared enforcers. Kar embodies the terror of the Inquisitors.
Kar is a brutish Inquisitor, one of the Lord Ruler’s feared enforcers. His presence signals danger.
Kar is a brutish Inquisitor, one of the Lord Ruler’s feared enforcers. He is an enduring symbol of the empire’s brutality.
Captain Demoux is a soldier who fights for the rebellion. Loyal and steady, he follows orders without complaint.
Captain Demoux is a soldier who fights for the rebellion. He earns the trust of the crew.
Captain Demoux is a soldier who fights for the rebellion. Demoux becomes a key figure in the Survivor’s forces.
Captain Demoux is a soldier who fights for the rebellion. His loyalty and honor never falter.
Lord Venture is the head of House Venture, a powerful noble house. He oversees his house’s vast influence.
Lord Venture is the head of House Venture, a powerful noble house. His political maneuvering affects the rebellion’s plans.
Lord Venture is the head of House Venture, a powerful noble house. Venture remains a symbol of noble power.
Lord Venture is the head of House Venture, a powerful noble house. His position defines much of the noble conflict.
Yeden is the skaa rebellion’s leader, determined to overthrow the empire. He hires Kelsier’s crew to guide the uprising.
Yeden is the skaa rebellion’s leader, determined to overthrow the empire. Yeden is zealous but inexperienced.
Yeden is the skaa rebellion’s leader, determined to overthrow the empire. His fervor pushes the rebellion forward.
Yeden is the skaa rebellion’s leader, determined to overthrow the empire. Yeden’s legacy endures in the cause.

recaps.1: Vin survives on the streets of Luthadel, wary of everyone around her.
recaps.2: Kelsier, a daring crew leader, sets a bold plan into motion.
recaps.3: Vin begins to cross paths with Kelsier’s crew.
recaps.4: Hints of Vin’s hidden talents begin to surface.
recaps.5: The crew starts teaching Vin the basics of their world.
recaps.6: Kelsier’s legend grows as his plans for rebellion gain momentum.
recaps.7: Vin is drawn further into the crew’s schemes.
recaps.8: The noble houses’ power struggles become clearer.
recaps.9: Vin starts learning to trust her new allies.
recaps.10: The rebellion’s preparations deepen in secrecy.
recaps.11: Kelsier inspires the skaa with talk of hope.
recaps.12: Vin’s training challenges her to think differently.
recaps.13: The dangers of the empire become more visible.
recaps.14: Vin begins to step into a larger role in the crew.
recaps.15: Plans for a grand infiltration start taking shape.
recaps.16: Vin takes on a new identity for the rebellion’s purposes.
recaps.17: The crew sees progress in their daring plot.
recaps.18: Kelsier pushes the rebellion forward, despite risks.
recaps.19: Vin grows more confident among the nobility.
recaps.20: The empire’s grip on the city feels ever-present.
recaps.21: The stakes for Vin and the crew keep rising.
recaps.22: Allies are tested as the rebellion advances.
recaps.23: Vin sees firsthand the cost of their struggle.
recaps.24: The city stirs with unease as the crew’s plan unfolds.
recaps.25: Vin juggles her double life with growing skill.
recaps.26: The crew presses forward with their mission.
recaps.27: Danger edges closer to the rebellion’s members.
recaps.28: Tensions grow between the skaa and the nobility.
recaps.29: Vin feels the weight of the rebellion’s hopes.
recaps.30: The Lord Ruler’s shadow looms larger than ever.
recaps.31: The crew faces new, unexpected obstacles.
recaps.32: Vin is forced to take bigger risks.
recaps.33: The rebellion’s plans near their breaking point.
recaps.34: Vin’s path becomes even more dangerous.
recaps.35: Kelsier’s influence continues to shape the crew.
recaps.36: Vin steps fully into her power.
recaps.37: The final stages of the rebellion unfold.
recaps.38: The struggle for Luthadel comes to a head.
